text: aur vahaan resha (baal) baraabar bhee tum logon par julm nahin kiya jaega tum chaahe jaho ho maut to tumako le daalegee agarache tum kaise hee mazaboot pakke gumbadon mein ja chhupo aur unako agar koee bhalaee pahunchatee hai to kahane lagate hain ki ye khuda kee taraf se hai aur agar unako koee takaleef pahunchatee hai to (sharaarat se) kahane lagate hain ki (ai rasool) ye tumhaaree badaulat hai (ai rasool) tum kah do ki sab khuda kee taraf se hai pas un logon ko kya ho gaya hai ki rkoee baat hee nahin samajhate
